Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 122nd overall pick, by Baltimore in 2005...
Injured on 8/26/2007 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 6/28/2008 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 5/31/2011, off Ryan Dempster (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/25/2011, off Jason Vargas (LAA)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against New York (A) on 4/30/2012...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 2012...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Texas on 4/11/2014...
Won Gold Glove Award at Second Base in 2015...
Traded from Baltimore to Milwaukee on 5/23/2016 (Going to MIL: 2B T. Tomiichi. Going to BAL: 2B J. Ohl)...
Traded from Milwaukee to Tampa Bay on 6/16/2017 (Going to MIL: C B. De La Rosa, DH B. Belt, CF T. Wheeler, P L. Shaw. Going to TB: P J. Gobble, 1B N. Swisher, CF G. Springer, 1B S. Buckley, SS T.
Tomiichi)...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/15/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
